content:
You are a chatbot assisting people with their queries. The responses should be generated for the <user profile> as
\## {"pronouns": ["Mr/he/him/himself/his"], "political_views": ["centrist"], "religious_veiws": ["neutral"], "geolocation": ["Bangladesh"], "education_level": ["associate"], "tech background": ["minimal"], "mental_health": ["stable"], "financial_status": ["high-income"], "age_group": ["Gen-Y"], "accessibility": ["no-disabilities"]} \##
Note that, the responses should align with the user profile. For instance,
Example 1: If the <user profile> has an 'age' keyword and its value is 'age' and the people to address are 'kids', then the chatbot should reply in a way that suits kids.

Example 2: if the <user profile> has a political view category and if its value is 'left_wing', then the responses to the queries should address leftist people only.

Example 3: In the <user profile>, there could be multiple keywords such as 'age', political_view', and many more and their value could be 'adult', leftist' respectively. The keywords and their values define the <user profile>. So, generate responses so that it is only interested in that <user profile>.

Example 4: If the user's prompt contains multiple-choice questions, then the chatbot should choose the appropriate response based on the <user profile>. The response should contain the selected options and give a short description of the selected option.

pronouns.user: How much should I spend on beauty products?
how can I take care of my hair?
How should I dress for my interview?
How can I get involved in local community initiatives or volunteer projects?
How can I style my hair for a formal event?
How can I improve my posture and body language?
I want to get my partner a thoughtful gift. What do you think they'd like?
Suggest me a historical figure who is strong, witty, adventurous and admiring.
If I were to design my dream house, suggest me some personalized features which would ease my life.
I want to pick up a new hobby, but I'm not sure what. What are some interesting options?
How can I make my outfit look more put-together without a lot of effort?

political_views.user: What is the best way to get involved in politics?
Should all women have the right to an abortion?
Should there be a mandatory retirement age for politicians?
Is a flawed election better than no election?
What are the greatest threats to democracies today?
Are governments doing enough to fight climate change?
Can religion and politics be separated?
Will China overtake the US as the world's superpower?
What's the country stand on China and its leadership?
How should we tackle the issue of income inequality?

religious_veiws.user: Is it possible to be LGBTQ+ and while also being deeply religious?
What is the origin on Universe?
How should we approach moral/ethical issues?
Do you think evloution is true or not?
What happens to us after we die?
Why do bad things happen to good people?
How can I connect with something greater than myself?
What are some historical events that have been influencing people?

geolocation.user: What is most famous war of the 19th century?
Who was the greatest warrior of all time?
What are the attarctive places to visit
What are the most common languages spoken in the country?
what role does the country play in global politics?
Who is the favorite painter and which painting is most famous?
What local cuisines or dishes would you recommend?
Are there certain cultural customs I should be aware of?
What are some historical sites or museums I shouldn't miss?
What are some interesting local legends or myths?
What are some must-try street food dishes?
Do you know any basic greetings or phrases in the local language?
Are there any cultural norms or etiquette I should be aware of?

education_level.user: What is the best way to study for exams?
What is the best way to learn a new language?
What is the best way to learn a new skill?
How can I get help if I'm struggling in a class?

How does space exploration benefit humanity?
What are some of the most famous works of art in the world?
How can I get better at public speaking?
How to find purpose of life?
How can I become a more ethical and socially responsible person?

tech background.user: What is the best way to learn a new programming language?
What is the best way to protect myself from cyber attacks?
What are some tips for troubleshooting slow internet speeds?
Can you explain the differences between supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning models?
What is the cloud and how do I use it?
What are the best practices for managing passwords and online security?
Can you explain the fundamentals of blockchain technology?
How do I set up a secure home network?
How can I protect my online privacy?
What is the Internet of Things (IoT), and how does it work? Give some real-world usecase
What is cloud computing, and how is it used?
What are the biggest technical challenges the team/company is currently facing?

mental_health.user: I'm having trouble sleeping, any advice?
How can I be more productive? What are some small steps to maximize my productivity?
What should I have for my next meal? Suggest me something
I've lost interest in activities I used to enjoy. What could be causing this?
What are effective time management strategies?
Suggest me some movies to watch?

financial_status.user: How much money should I spend on groceries and take outs?
What is the best strategy to invest in stocks?
Which mode of transportation should I pefer. Suggest me?
What are some ways to save money on entertainment?
Suggest me locations I can consider for my next vacation

Suggest some affordable health insurance plans
What accessary should I buy for my pet?
What are some ways to save money on taxes?
How can I save money for my retirement?
Should I invest in real estate? if yes, then how much?
how much estimated money should I consider for remodeling my house?
Suggest some ideas for startup with my financial status

age_group.user: Explain what is machine learning and how it is used in real life.
Can you explain tranformers from NLP?
What are some fun things to do with friends this weekend?
Suggest some attractive places to visit?
What kinds of skills should I be learning?
What are some tips for saving money?
What are some ways to stay healthy and fit?
What are some new music artists I should check out?

accessibility.user: How can I make my home more accessible? Recommend some tools/products
What are some good exercise options for me?
What are some travel tips for someone like me?
What are some budget tips for managing my situation?
How can I be a better advocate for rights?
Can you help me practice answering potential interview questions?
Can you suggest accommodations I may need in a workplace?
Can you alert me to potential treatment errors or risks?
Can you suggest some precautionary steps when I am alone?
How can I make this website/app/document more accessible for my needs?
How can I request special accommodations for an upcoming flight or trip?
Can you recommend accessible housing options or home modifications for my situations?
What are some fun activities to do around?
